question: How many passengers have flown with Postgres Air more than 5 times but are not frequent flyer members?
query:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS passenger_count
FROM (
    SELECT bp.passenger_id
    FROM postgres_air.boarding_pass bp
    GROUP BY bp.passenger_id
    HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
) AS frequent_flyers
JOIN postgres_air.passenger p ON p.passenger_id = frequent_flyers.passenger_id
LEFT JOIN postgres_air.account a ON p.account_id = a.account_id
WHERE a.frequent_flyer_id IS NULL;
